definition: to, toward or at one side, (used especially of glances) directed to one side with or as if with doubt or suspicion or envy
details:
adverb
- to, toward or at one side
= example: to, toward or at one side
= synonyms: obliquely
- with the side toward someone or something
= example: with the side toward someone or something
- on the side
= example: on the side
adjective
- (used especially of glances) directed to one side with or as if with doubt or suspicion or envy
= synonyms: askance
- inclining or directed to one side
= example: inclining or directed to one side
- situated at or extending to the side
= synonyms: lateral
